title: [Sylvarraend Herbals, Back Room]
description: Soft mats have been placed along the walls of this brightly lit room.  Sunlight floods the area from a series of glaesineth windows, providing a lovely view of the forest to those recuperating from their injuries.  Along the back, a beautiful garden can be seen through an etched glaesineth door.

Soft mats have been placed along the walls of this brightly lit room.  Sunlight floods the area from a series of glaesine windows lining the rear wall, providing a lovely view of the forest to those recuperating from their injuries.

Soft mats have been placed along the walls of this dimly lit room.  Pale moonlight floods the area from a series of glaesine windows lining the rear wall, providing a lovely view of the starry night sky to those recuperating from their injuries.
